Uses of Package
burtis.common.events.flow

  • Packages that use burtis.common.events.flow 
    Package Description
    burtis.common.events
    Common events used across modules.
    burtis.common.events.flow
    Events used to manage flow of simulation, directed to synchronization module.
    burtis.modules
    BUsRealTImeSimulator - BURTIS Simulates random passenger behaviours, while optimising bus schedule.
    burtis.modules.busscheduler
    Schedules buses to optimise performance of whole system.
    burtis.modules.gui  
    burtis.modules.network.server
    Classes performing Server-side network operations.
    burtis.modules.passengers
    Simulates random passenger behaviours, such as their initial appearance and destination.
    burtis.modules.simulation
    This module controls bus movements and their position.
    burtis.modules.sync
    This module controls time flow of simulation, dictating clock ticks to all other modules.
  • Classes in burtis.common.events.flow used by burtis.common.events 
    Class and Description
    CycleCompletedEvent
    Event to be sent upon module main loop completion.
    DoStepEvent
    Requests another tick to be done in stepping mode, resulting in stepping mode being activated if not yet active.
    ModuleReadyEvent
    Event to be sent when sender module is ready to start simulation.
    PauseSimulationEvent
    Requests to pause continuous ticking.
    SetCycleLengthEvent
    Informs synchronization module of the new requested period between ticks.
    StartSimulationEvent
    Informs that ticking should start continuously.
    TerminateSimulationEvent
    Informs that simulation is or should be shut down and no other events will or should be sent.
    TickEvent
    Represents clock tick and informs on the new iteration, providing current iteration index.
  • Classes in burtis.common.events.flow used by burtis.common.events.flow 
    Class and Description
    FlowEvent
    Event directed to Sync module.
  • Classes in burtis.common.events.flow used by burtis.modules 
    Class and Description
    TickEvent
    Represents clock tick and informs on the new iteration, providing current iteration index.
  • Classes in burtis.common.events.flow used by burtis.modules.busscheduler 
    Class and Description
    TerminateSimulationEvent
    Informs that simulation is or should be shut down and no other events will or should be sent.
